# Contributors

Thank you to everyone who has contributed to Valid8r! This project thrives because of your efforts.

## Contribution Tiers

We recognize contributors at different levels based on their involvement:

| Tier | Requirements | Recognition |
|------|--------------|-------------|
| **Explorer** | 1st merged PR | Welcome mention in release notes |
| **Builder** | 3+ merged PRs | Listed in this file |
| **Champion** | 10+ merged PRs | Triage permissions, badge in profile |
| **Maintainer** | 25+ merged PRs + consistent quality | Review permissions, co-maintainer status |

## Hall of Fame

## How to Get Recognized

1. **Submit a PR**: Your first merged PR earns you Explorer status
2. **Keep contributing**: Reach Builder status at 3 PRs, Champion at 10
3. **Quality matters**: Consistent, high-quality contributions lead to Maintainer status

### Contribution Types We Recognize

- **Code**: New features, bug fixes, performance improvements
- **Documentation**: Guides, API docs, examples, translations
- **Tests**: Unit tests, BDD scenarios, integration tests
- **Infrastructure**: CI/CD, tooling, developer experience
- **Community**: Answering questions, reviewing PRs, triaging issues
- **Design**: UX feedback, API design discussions
- **Security**: Vulnerability reports, security improvements

## Milestones We Celebrate

We publicly celebrate contributor achievements:

- **First PR merged**: Welcome message in the PR
- **10th PR merged**: Shoutout in release notes
- **25th PR merged**: Featured in project announcements
- **100th PR merged**: Special recognition + swag (when available)

## Adding Yourself

After your first PR is merged, you're welcome to add yourself to the "All Contributors" section! Just include the change in a follow-up PR or ask a maintainer to add you.

### Format

```markdown
| [@your-username](https://github.com/your-username) | Code, Documentation |
```

Use the appropriate contribution types from the list above.
